entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 07:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this morning. Rain beginning early this afternoon except snow over higher terrain. Local snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
